How many people are affected by familial paroxysmal nonkinesigenic dyskinesia ?,Familial paroxysmal nonkinesigenic dyskinesia is a very rare disorder. Its prevalence is estimated to be 1 in 5 million people.,GHR,familial paroxysmal nonkinesigenic dyskinesia
